price: This is how Allah makes His verses clear to you, so that you may understand.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yubayyinu al-lahu lakum āyātihi laʿallakum taʿqilūna
